meanings.definition: A small portion or division of a larger lot or parcel of land.
meanings.sent1: The sublot behind the house is perfect for a small garden.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent showed us the sublot next to the park.
meanings.sent3: The sublot with the big tree would be a great spot for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her dream was to build a cozy cabin on the sublot near the river.
meanings.sent5: The sublot at the corner of the street had the best view of the sunset.

meanings.definition: To divide a larger lot into smaller sections for individual sale or development.
meanings.sent1: They decided to sublot the land to create more housing options.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to sublot the property into commercial and residential areas.
meanings.sent3: He will sublot the field to allow different farmers to cultivate crops.
meanings.sent4: The developer will sublot the area to build a new shopping center.
meanings.sent5: She hopes to sublot the land and sell it to interested buyers.
